instanceVariables.name: row
instanceVariables.desc: Number of rows of the table

instanceVariables.name: col
instanceVariables.desc: Number of cols of the table

instanceVariables.name: rowOffset
instanceVariables.desc: A pixel offset to apply to the grid so it does not start in the top left corner

instanceVariables.name: colOffset
instanceVariables.desc: A pixel offset to apply to the grid so it is centered

instanceVariables.name: crXoffset
instanceVariables.desc: The X of the cell that will contain the pivot point of the shape on creation

instanceVariables.name: crYoffset
instanceVariables.desc: The Y of the cell that will contain the pivot point of the shape on creation

instanceVariables.name: linesNB
instanceVariables.desc: The numbner of completed lines by the player

instanceVariables.name: scoreMultiplier
instanceVariables.desc: A multiplier for bonus points according to the number of lines completed at the same time

instanceVariables.name: fallTime
instanceVariables.desc: The frequency of time at which the falling shape is moved

instanceVariables.name: pieceInLine
instanceVariables.desc: Checks if we have enough instances on the same row to consider a completed line

instanceVariables.name: lineScan
instanceVariables.desc: Consider if we have no instances on the current row when reorganising the board after having removed a line

instanceVariables.name: lineRemove
instanceVariables.desc: Is the board to be reorganised ?
